review: It's pretty good, for a while... but it is good... kind of...

I've changed the name of this game to 'with my ♥♥♥♥' so that whenever I start playing it, my friends see that I'm currently 'playing with my ♥♥♥♥'. Why? Because I can sit there and play with my ♥♥♥♥ for hours and hours on end and never get bored. Same situation with this game.
